predicate.note: Frames file for 'trek' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion.

example.name: direction, not path
example.text: Sen. Alan Cranston trekked over to the House side of Capitol Hill a few days ago and volunteered his testimony to fellow Democrat Rep. Henry Gonzalez.
example.arg: to the House side of Capitol Hill

example.name: with path
example.text: Since his death, John has been trekking the Himalayas.
